reference.shortdesc: A definition list is a list of items and their corresponding definitions.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: A definition list is typically rendered in the following way:

ul.li: The definition term is located against the starting margin of the page or column.
The definition description is indented. It is located either on the same line as the definition term, or it is placed on the next line.
The optional header content is located on a line before the definition list entries.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and compact.
